column1: <desc>Visual representation of invoice compliance risks based on the provided data.</desc>
<circle cx="50" cy="50" r="30" fill="#FFCACA" stroke="#CD5C5C" stroke-width="2"/>
<text x="60" y="60" font-size="20" font-family="sans-serif" fill="#CD5C5C">Late Payments</text>
<circle cx="50" cy="150" r="30" fill="#FFCACA" stroke="#CD5C5C" stroke-width="2"/>
<text x="60" y="160" font-size="20" font-family="sans-serif" fill="#CD5C5C">Data Inconsistencies</text>
<circle cx="50" cy="250" r="30" fill="#FFCACA" stroke="#CD5C5C" stroke-width="2"/>
<text x="60" y="260" font-size="20" font-family="sans-serif" fill="#CD5C5C">High Value Anomalies</text>
<text x="100" y="380" font-size="12" font-family="sans-serif" fill="#000000">Data source: Invoice Risk Analysis</text>
